body_html:
Weights alone may not amount to much (and there may be extra memory baggage besides the numerical values of the weights alone, for example). Keep in mind that there is a whole computational graph and whatever. Did you try running it on CPU to get a feel for RAM usage? It's almost certainly not 1-to-1, but it may be an indicator.

EDIT: Ah, I see you have volatile set to True. I'd still run it through a CPU, though.
